name: SOS - Piano
description:
Play a little nervy ladybird helping her pianist friend by unblocking the keys of his old piano while he's playing his favorite salsa song.

Best played with an xbox gamepad, but you can also use the keyboard and the space bar.

A game made during the 36 hours of the Monster Game Jam by Guillaume Bouckaert and Xan Harotin, with help from Julien Mizac for the sound.
